_notes.ocr_variance: AI-based OCR results may vary between model versions. Ground truth represents ideal expected values.
_notes.known_issue_form_type: Party-list forms (บช) may be detected without the (บช) suffix, causing classification as constituency forms.

high_res_page-1.png.notes: Province should be แพร่ (Phrae). Vote counts vary based on model interpretation. OCR may extract different provinces.

bch_page-1.png.notes: Party-list form with parties 1-20 on this page. KNOWN ISSUE: OCR may not detect (บช) suffix, causing form_type to be classified as constituency.

bch_page-2.png.notes: Party-list form with parties 21-40 on this page. KNOWN ISSUE: OCR may not detect (บช) suffix.

bch_page-3.png.notes: Party-list form with parties 41-57 on this page. KNOWN ISSUE: OCR may not detect (บช) suffix.

bch_page-4.png.notes: Party-list form summary page with totals. KNOWN ISSUE: OCR may not detect (บช) suffix.

province_extraction.description: Province must be a valid Thai province

form_type_detection.description: Form type must match one of 6 types

is_party_list.description: Must correctly identify constituency vs party-list

vote_count_accuracy.description: Vote counts must match handwritten values

sum_validation.description: Sum of votes must equal valid votes

thai_provinces_sample: กรุงเทพมหานคร
นครราชสีมา
นครศรีธรรมราช
